name: Scroll of Acid Rain
description: Summons a face melting rain cloud to damage your opponent for 8 seconds.
notes: Deals 50% Hybrid Damage and applies Acid Rain to the target, a 250% hybrid damage DoT (67% per tick) for 8 seconds.

name: Scroll of Arc Lightning
description: Emits a burst of electrical energy that will bounce to up to 3 targets, dealing more damage with each bounce.
notes: Deals 90% Weapon Damage to the primary target, and 50% more to each consecutive target.

name: Scroll of Bane
description: Deals damage and applies an effect based on your target's tag.

name: Scroll of Blessed Shard
description: If your target is undead, this attack pierces your targets armor leaving them extremely vulnerable to all attacks for 10 seconds.
notes: Can only be used againstUndead Monsters.
Deals 50% Spell Damage and applies Vulnerable to the target, increasing its All In by 50% for 10 seconds.
Used in the 'Shadowslayer Summoning Ritual' quest.

name: Scroll of Blinding Light
description: Deals damage to all enemies in range with a chance to blind your target.
notes: Blinded cannot be applied if the target hasShadow Sealedactive, but does not fade if Shadow Sealed is applied after.
Deals 300% Hybrid DPS to up to 4 targets and has a chance to apply Blinded to the target, decreasing its Hit Chance by 50% for 6 seconds.

name: Scroll of Cantor s Lament
description: Enchant your weapon with Crescendo a magical poison, dealing damage over 10 seconds, that get's stronger every time it deals damage.
notes: Deals 100% Spell Damage and applies Crescendo to the target.

name: Scroll of Chain Lightning
description: This scroll arcs lightning to up to 4 targets, dealing less damage to each new target (scrolls must be equipped in order to be used from your Action Bar!).

name: Scroll of Chains
description: Deals moderate damage, bouncing up to 3 targets with a chance to slow your targets haste significantly. Stronger with a higher Attack Power.
notes: Deals 180% Weapon DPS and has a chance to apply Chained to the target, reducing its Haste by 50% for 8 seconds.

name: Scroll of Chaos Fog
description: A poisonous gas that instills insanity dealing damage with a chance to stun or cause insanity. Insane opponents have a reduced chance to dodge and deal less critical strikes.
notes: Deals 150% Hybrid DPS and has a chance to apply either effect to the target:Insanity, reducing its Crit Chance and Dodge by 50% for 10 seconds.Stunned, stunning them for 2 seconds.

name: Scroll of Charged Flare
description: Summon a burst of electricity shocking the two closest targets for high damage with a chance to stun your target.
notes: Deals 400% Hybrid DPS and has a chance to apply Stunned to the target, stunning them for 2 seconds.

name: Scroll of Corrosion
description: Summon the wrath of nature to poison your opponent and weaken their defenses for 4 seconds.
notes: Deals 100% Hybrid Damage and applies Corrosion to the target, increasing its All In by 20% for 6 seconds.

name: Scroll of Cripple
description: Curse your opponent dealing moderate damage while crippling their attack speed for 6 seconds.
notes: Deals 150% Hybrid DPS and applies Crippled to the target, decreasing its Haste by 20% for 6 seconds.

name: Scroll of Crushing Wave
description: Summons a tidal wave to crush your opponent where he stands. Stronger with high Spell Power.

name: Scroll of Dark Arc
description: A magical attacks that bounces up to 4 targets dealing light damage with a chance to blind each target.
notes: Blinded cannot be applied if the target hasShadow Sealedactive, but does not fade if Shadow Sealed is applied after.
Deals 100% Hybrid DPS and has a chance to apply Blinded to the target, reducing its Hit Chance by 50% for 6 seconds.

name: Scroll of Dark Energy
description: Condenses dark energy into a solid projectile and launches it at your enemy.
notes: Used in the following quests:'Reborn in the Dark Side (Rare)''Reborn in the Dark Side (Shadow)'

name: Scroll of Dark Flare
description: Unleash a torrent of dark energies that strikes up to 5 targets near by dealing moderate damage. (Potions must be equipped in order to be used from your Action Bar!)

name: Scroll of Dark Grip
description: Darkness grips your enemy reducing haste and increasing all damage they receive.
notes: Applies Dark Grip to the target, reducing its Haste by 20% and increasing its All In by 20% for 16 seconds.
Used in the following quests:'Reborn in the Dark Side (Rare)''Reborn in the Dark Side (Shadow)'

name: Scroll of Death Pact
description: As a last resort this black magic spell will lash out at your opponent in revenge dealing more damage the closer you are to death. Stronger with high Attack Power.
notes: Deals 110% Weapon DPS at max health, damage increases the lower your current health is.

name: Scroll of Decay
description: Decay prevents your opponent from healing for 10 seconds.
notes: Deals 40% Hybrid Damage and applies Decay, Cannot Heal to the target, preventing it to heal (except lifesteals) for 10 seconds.

name: Scroll of Diamond Cage
description: Summons multiple razor sharp diamonds that surround and tear at your opponent. Stronger with a high attack power.

name: Scroll of Dissonance
description: Reduces the target's damage and haste by 15% and critical strike chance by 5%, and grants an additional mana to attackers striking the target for 15 seconds.
notes: Applies Dissonance to the target, reducing its Haste and outgoing damage by 15% and Crit Chance by 5%. Also grants 2 mana to the attacker for every hit attempt (restores mana even on dodges and misses). Lasts 15 seconds.

name: Scroll of Distracting Hugs
description: Hug your opponent and cloud their mine in a snugglific mist causing them to miss with most attacks for the next 8 seconds.

name: Scroll of Doom Flare
description: Unleash a torrent of dark energies that strikes up to 5 targets near by dealing moderate damage.

name: Scroll of Eclipse
description: Summon a small solar eclipse to burn a group of enemies. The damage increases for each target struck.
notes: Used in the 'Book of Aether: Supernova' and 'Shadowslayer Summoning Ritual' quests.

name: Scroll of Enrage
description: This spell forces your target to focus their attacks on you and causes them to attack recklessly lowering their damage for 10 seconds. (Taunt effects do not work on players.)
notes: Applies Focus to the target, forcing it to attack the user for 6 seconds.
Applies Reckless to the target, reducing all outgoing damage by 15% for 10 seconds.

name: Scroll of Ethereal Curse
description: Curses your target to exist partially within the ethereal plane reducing their haste and total damage for 6 seconds.
notes: Reduces targets Outgoing damage by 30% and Haste by 25% for 6 seconds.
Used in the 'Book of Arcana: Arcane Sigil' quest.

name: Scroll of Ethereal Slumber
description: Send your opponent into a deep sleep within the ethereal plane for 10 seconds. Your target is stunned for the duration but also takes 90% less damage from all attacks while ethereal.

name: Scroll of Exorcise
description: A light based ranged attack, high damage against undead enemies.
notes: Does 500% variable magical attack damage toUndead Monstersand 200% to others.

name: Scroll of Fire Flare
description: Summon a burst of Fire to hit up to 3 targets around you for high damage. Stronger with high Spell Power.

name: Scroll of Fire Storm
description: Summon a tempest of flame and destruction that deals damage scaled directly with your spell power but will leave you burned and scared in the process.
notes: Applies Scared to the player, reducing Intellect by 99% for 12 seconds.
Applies Burned to the player, a DoT lasting 6 seconds.
Used in the 'Book of Fire: Immolation' quest.

name: Scroll of Fireball (1)
description: This scroll hurls flame at your opponent, dealing moderate damage on impact.
notes: Also see:Scroll of Fireball (2).Scroll of Fireball (3).

name: Scroll of Fireball (2)
description: Hurls flame at your opponent, dealing moderate damage on impact.
notes: Also see:Scroll of Fireball (1).Scroll of Fireball (3).

name: Scroll of Fireblast
description: Hurls flames at your opponents, dealing light damage to up to 4 targets.

name: Scroll of Firebolt
description: Cast a flaming projectile dealing high damage with a chance to catch your target on fire for double damage.
notes: Has a chance to apply Burning to the target, casting a high DoT for 6 seconds.

name: Scroll of Freezing Flame
description: Deals moderate damage and either burns your foe for damage over time or freezes your target in place stunning them for 4 seconds. Effect increased by Elemental Grasp.

name: Scroll of Frost Flare
description: Summon a snowy explosion hitting up to 4 targets for moderate damage.

name: Scroll of Frostbite
description: Deal moderate freezing damage with a small chance to encase your opponent in a block of ice, stunning them for 6 seconds.
notes: Used in the 'Book of Ice: Glacial Impact' quest.

name: Scroll of Furious Gale
description: Strike your opponent with elemental fury and a chance to slow their attacks. Stronger with high Spell Power.

name: Scroll of Geyser
description: Summon a boiling burst of water to scorch your opponent. Deals more damage with high Spell Power.

name: Scroll of Guardian Blast
description: Calls forth mighty dragon flames to scorch your opponents.

name: Scroll of Heartbeat
description: Deals 10% of current HP plus moderate magical damage to the target.

name: Scroll of Holy Bolt
description: Launch a righteous ball of evil slaying to destroy undead with a chance to blind your target.

name: Scroll of Holy Flare
description: Unleash a torrent of holy energies striking up to 5 targets. Deals extra damage verses undead.

name: Scroll of Ice Shard
description: This scroll launches a freezing shard at your enemy, dealing moderate damage and reducing their attack speed and power.
notes: Applies Frigid to the target, reducing their attack power and Haste by 20% for 10 seconds.

name: Scroll of Life Steal
description: Drains some of the target's HP and gives it to you. (Scrolls must be equipped in order to be used from your Action Bar!)

name: Scroll of Mystify
description: Cloud your opponent's mind in a clouding mist causing them to miss with most attacks for the next 8 seconds.
notes: Used in the 'Book of Magus: Incantation' quest.

name: Scroll of Nightmares
description: Inflict a terrible dream upon your opponent, stunning them for 4 seconds, but reducing all damage they take by 10%. 60 second cooldown. (Potions must be equipped in order to be used from your Action Bar!)

name: Scroll of Pangs
description: Applies the Pangs DoT (Damage Over Time) to the the target, dealing an increasing percentage of weapon damage with each tick.
notes: Applies Pangs to the target, a moderate DoT that lasts for 12 seconds.

name: Scroll of Petrify
description: Unleash a powerful curse on your opponent stunning them and turning them into wood. Reduces all damage they take by 10% for the duration.

name: Scroll of Plague Flare
description: Summon an explosion of pestilence dealing high damage to up to 3 targets. Stronger with high Attack Power.

name: Scroll of Plasma Bolt
description: An energy-based ranged attack dealing physical and magical damage.

name: Scroll of Psychic Wave
description: You send out waves of psychic energy dealing moderate damage to one or two enemies near you. Stronger with high Spell Power.

name: Scroll of Pulse Compression
description: A strong ranged attack. Applies Pulse Compression, reducing the target's haste by 15% for 6 seconds.

name: Scroll of Purge
description: Furiously rip the evil nature from your target dealing moderate damage with a chance to weaken your opponent.

name: Scroll of Satisfying Snooze
description: Send your opponent into a deep sleep within the ethereal plane for 10 seconds. Your target is stunned for the duration but also takes 90% less damage from all attacks while ethereal.

name: Scroll of Scorched Steel
description: Enchant your weapon with searing flames for a devastating attack. Deals more damage with high Attack Power.
notes: Used in the following quests:'Forge the Blaze of Awe''Forge the Blazing Light of Destiny''Forge the Burning Sword of Doom'

name: Scroll of Shadow Bolt
description: Hurls a bolt of dark energy that can rend flesh and steel alike. Stronger when cast by the magically adept.

name: Scroll of Shadowblade
description: Enchant your weapon with dark power dealing physical and magical damage with a chance to completely blind your opponent.

name: Scroll of Shadowburn
description: Deals moderate weapon damage plus magical damage with a 50% chance to stun your target.

name: Scroll of Shiftburn
description: Deals light damage with a chance to apply up to 6 different effects from increasing haste to dealing incredible amounts of damage.
notes: Previously called"Scroll of Shift Burn"and before"Scroll of Shiftburn".
Applies Burning to the target, casting a moderate DoT lasting 10 seconds.
Applies noMana to the user, reducing mana usage by 90% for 21 seconds.
Has a chance to apply Trolled, stunning the user for 2 seconds.
Has a chance to apply Stunned, stunning the target for 2 seconds.
Has a chance to apply Shifting to the user, increasing haste for 10 seconds.
Has a chance to apply Shifted to the user, a high HoT lasting 10 seconds.
Has a chance to apply Burnated to the target, reducing their damage taken by 25% for 10 seconds.

name: Scroll of Soul Crush
description: A quick attack dealing physical and magical damage, with a chance to apply Soulless increasing your opponents mana costs significantly for 6 seconds.

name: Scroll of Spirit Rend
description: A holy blast that bounces from to up 3 targets dealing more damage with each target. Stronger with higher spell power.
notes: Used in the 'Shadowslayer Summoning Ritual' quest.

name: Scroll of Ssikari s Breath
description: Breathes fire on your target causing moderate damage and applying the DragonBurn state to them for Damage Over Time.

name: Scroll of Torment
description: Magically torment your foe's mind, causing slight damage and causing critical strikes to tickle.
notes: Reduces the target's Critical Multiplier by 190% for 10 seconds.

name: Scroll of Underworld
description: Launch a spirit bomb at your target that will bounce to additional targets dealing more damage with each bounce. Strikes up to 6 targets.
notes: Used in the 'A Dark Temptation' quest.

name: Scroll of Void Strike
description: A strong attack which deals weapon damage plus an amount derived from your current HP and MP.
notes: Damage is 30% of current HP + Spell Power.

name: Scroll of Weaken
description: Deals light damage and weakens the target lowering their damage for 6 seconds.

name: Scroll of Wind Strike
description: Gusts of devastating wind are launched at your opponent dealing high damage.

name: Scroll of Wither
description: Curse your opponents strength to wither and deteriorate, their attacks deal 30% less damage for 4 seconds.
